description: Watch the Mark Gungor Show every weekday starting at 10am central time. Join Mark and co-hosts Diane Brierley and Phil Gungor as they discuss any and all issues concerning life, love and marriage. This is your opportunity to hear Mark answer your questions. Mark is the creator of the Laugh Your Way to a Better Marriage seminar, and one of the most sought-after speakers in the country on marriage and family.
title: The Mark Gungor Show Video
